name: Biogas, burned in flare
description: This process represents the combustion of biogas in a flare. The emission factors were compiled by Environment Canada and are originally drawn from the US EPA's FIRE database.
category: 56: Administrative and Support and Waste Management and Remediation Services/5622: Waste Treatment and Disposal

processDocumentation.dataSelectionDescription: selected maximum emission value from cited studies.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Values converted to be on the basis of whole biogas.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: This process is intended to be used as a background process by LCA practitioners, industry and the general public to reflect the impact of anaerobic digestion biogas combustion.
processDocumentation.projectDescription: Data were prepared by Eastern Research Group (ERG) on behalf of the U.S. EPA under Contract No. EP-C-14-022 WA 1-11, "LCA and Cost Assessment of Nutrient Removal Technologies"

dataGenerator.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

dataDocumentor.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG
